channel.title: Leicester Square on Martin's Blog
channel.description: Recent content in Leicester Square on Martin's Blog

item.title: London visit - day 1 of 4
item.description: I soon realised my satnav is going to make me drive down the M4 right into the centre of London - no ifs or butts. Wasn’t that bad really, all I had to do is to imagine I was driving downtown Ljubljana - just on a much bigger scale. And it really went very well except at the very end one of the roads was closed and I had to make up a detour on my own - only to get myself even more stuck into the dreaded London rush-hour traffic jams.
